text: I'm Adam, a Passionate Android developer on a mission to create intuitive and innovative mobile experiences. I have been exploring the world of Android for the last couple of years. Having switched from Views and Java to Kotlin and Jetpack Compose, I absolutely love the developer experience the latter provides. Currently seeking new opportunities to contribute my skills to exiting projects.
Born in Poland, I am a native Polish speaker and possess a B2/C1 level proficiency in English.

Outside of programming, I’ve competed in international esports tournaments — including two LAN events in China — achieving top placements. This experience highlights my ability to stay focused under pressure, think strategically, and work effectively as part of a team.
